mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), productId = #{productId}, categoryId = #{categoryId}, memberId = #{memberId}, orderCode = CONCAT("orderCode__", UUID(), "__", RAND()), orderName = #{orderName}, cellphoneNo = #{cellphoneNo}, address = #{address}, email = #{email}, payment = #{payment}, totalPayment = #{totalPayment}
mapper.select: SELECT P.* FROM product AS P LEFT JOIN `order` AS O ON P.id = O.productId WHERE P.id = #{productId} AND P.delStatus = 0 LIMIT 1;
